subject: Oreder SSN4435 not been delivered
description_text:
Good morning

I placed an order for a pedal board, order SSN4435.

This order was shipped on December 5, 2025. I selected express delivery for
â‚¬26.95 with 3-7 day delivery. However, as of today (December 15, 2025), my
order has not been delivered.

The tracking for order SF6047135865743 has not been updated since December
10, 2025, at 9:00 PM. "The shipment has arrived at the CN Guangdong
Province Dongguan International Parcel Distribution Center."

Could you please check and let me know the reason for the delay?

I remain waiting.

Best regards.
Lorenzo Rubiu

conversations.body_text: Hi Lorenzo Rubiu1,    Your package was scheduled for delivery on the 19th, but due to overwhelming volume in our shipping channels, it could not be dispatched. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused and will refund the additional shipping fees for you.
